title: 23andMe reveals the extent of the recent hack on its platform
description: 23andMe recently disclosed a data breach wherein hackers gained unauthorized access to approximately 14,000 customer accounts, constituting 0.1% of its extensive customer base. This incident, unveiled in early October, highlighted the exploitation of a technique known as “credential stuffing,” where hackers infiltrate an account by utilizing a known password, potentially leaked from other breaches. 23andMe ... Read more

title: OKX Steps into India’s Web3 Space, Polygon Co-Founder Appreciates
description:
OKX has decided to step into India’s Web3 space, fostering the technology. The CEO Star X, commented on India’s potential to be a big contributor to the Web3 sector. The platform has no intention of starting crypto exchanges in the country. OKX, the world’s second-largest crypto exchange by 24-hour trading volume, has taken the initiative […]

The post OKX Steps into India’s Web3 Space, Polygon Co-Founder Appreciates appeared first on Coin Edition.
